author: adityapatwardhan
body:
The `PowerShell.Linux` package contains windows runtimes and vice versa. Only the runtimes for the current platform should be present.

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none
PS> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.2.0-rc.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.2.0-rc.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.18855
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: `PowerShell.Linux` and `PowerShell.Windows` nuget package contain extra runtimes
